directorLinkCorrespondenceManuallyTitle: If the registered office address changes in the future, do you want this to apply to the director's correspondence address too?
directorLinkCorrespondenceManuallyHintTe: We'll record the director's correspondence address as the 'same as the registered office address'. Future changes will also apply to the director's correspondence address.
Youâ€™ll need to enter the correspondence address manually on the next screen. Future changes to the registered office address will not apply to the correspondence address.
